posts.post_content:
Selling a few more duplicates in the raw category today.

All scans can be seen in my Collector Focus Duplicate file as well

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/duplicates/[/url]

All prices include shipping.  Will consider offers for multiple card purchases.

Take them all for $160.  no fee PP, check or MO.  Add $1/card for reg PP and $2 for Evers with reg PP.

See anything else you like in the CF file, let me know.  A few of them I'm not ready to sell, but we can always talk.  

Don't forget to check out Some Like 'Em Raw - Part 1 at a B/S/T near you today.  A couple stragglers have had prices reduced.

Johnny Evers - nearly a complete card with an Apple Sovereign Back - $66.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10935/evers-batting-chicago-shirt[/IMG]

Mike Powers - Tough common with a bit of paper loss - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10853/powers[/IMG]

Harry Krause (Pitching) - SC back, upper right crease but still VG - $26

 [IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10851/krause-pitching[/IMG]

Harry Lord - Piedmont back upper right crease D/VG - $24

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10969/lord[/IMG]

Sam Strang - Piedmont back - small crease top border - G - $22

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10976/strang[/IMG]

...can I get that Mike Powers card? PM will be sent.

Thanks!
